summary: Go Mi-Nyu, a girl about to become a nun, is asked to cover for her indisposed twin brother, Mi-Nam, who's on the verge of becoming a k-idol. To do so, she disguises herself as a boy and joins A.N.Jell, a really popular boy band.
cast: Park Shin-Hye|Keun-Suk Jang|Yong-hwa Jung|Hong-ki Lee|Ran Choi|Yu-jin Kim|Chan Jung|In-kwon Kim|Sung-ryung Kim|Geu-rin Bae|Soo Eun Choi|Hye-yeong Jeon|Byoung-Sook Sung|Min-yeong Kim|Soo-eun Choi|Won-yeong Jang|Yeong-Yong Kim|Soo-han Kang|Ho-Chang Kim|Ji-an Kim|Doo-Seon Park|After School|Dae-Sung Choi|Dae-ro Ha|Woo Joo|In-won Kim|Jung-ah Kim|Rebecka Kim|Jin-yeong Kwon|Joo-yeon Lee|Ji-Young Park|Kim Yeong-Hoon|So-young Yoo|Ki-won Yoon|Seung-ho Yoo

title: Minami Shineyo
